statements: SELECT * FROM emergency_contacts;
SELECT name, phone_number FROM emergency_contacts;
SELECT * FROM emergency_contacts WHERE relation = 'Sibling';
SELECT * FROM emergency_contacts ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name, phone_number FROM emergency_contacts WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT * FROM emergency_contacts WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, phone_number FROM emergency_contacts WHERE relation = 'Family';
SELECT * FROM emergency_contacts WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT id, name, relation FROM emergency_contacts ORDER BY name ASC, id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM emergency_contacts WHERE address = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM distress_areas;
SELECT area_name, area_population FROM distress_areas WHERE area_population > 100000;
SELECT area_name, area_location FROM distress_areas ORDER BY area_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM emergency_contacts WHERE contact_relation = 'Family';
SELECT contact_name, contact_phone_number FROM emergency_contacts ORDER BY contact_name;
SELECT contact_name, contact_phone_number FROM emergency_contacts WHERE contact_relation = 'Family'
SELECT area_name, area_location FROM distress_areas WHERE area_population > 10000 ORDER BY area_population DESC
SELECT * FROM distress_areas WHERE area_location IS NOT NULL
SELECT contact_name, contact_phone_number, contact_relation FROM emergency_contacts WHERE contact_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT contact_name, contact_phone_number, contact_relation FROM emergency_contacts WHERE contact_relation IN ('Family', 'Friend')
SELECT * FROM individuals WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, phone_number FROM emergency_contacts WHERE email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT area_name, population_density FROM distress_areas WHERE emergency_services_available = true;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM individuals WHERE medical_conditions LIKE '%diabetes%';
SELECT * FROM emergency_contacts WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM individuals;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM individuals WHERE age > 18;
SELECT name, phone_number, email FROM emergency_contacts WHERE email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT area_name, emergency_services_available, nearby_hospital FROM distress_areas WHERE population_density > 1000;
SELECT individuals.name, individuals.age, emergency_contacts.phone_number FROM individuals JOIN emergency_contacts ON individuals.emergency_contact_id = emergency_contacts.contact_id;
SELECT * FROM emergency_contacts;
SELECT full_name, phone_number FROM emergency_contacts WHERE email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT full_name, address FROM emergency_contacts WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT * FROM individuals ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT full_name, gender FROM individuals WHERE age >= 18 ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM emergency_contacts ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT full_name, phone_number, email FROM emergency_contacts WHERE address IS NOT NULL;
SELECT individual_id, full_name, age, gender FROM individuals WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT area_id, area_name, severity_level FROM distressed_areas WHERE severity_level >= 3;
SELECT log_id, individual_id, area_id, assistance_time FROM assistance_logs ORDER BY assistance_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM emergency_contacts;
SELECT contact_id, name FROM emergency_contacts WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT area_id, area_name, ST_AsText(location_point) FROM distressed_areas ORDER BY area_name DESC;
SELECT individual_id, relationship FROM individual_contacts WHERE area_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT request_id, status FROM assistance_requests WHERE request_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY status ASC;
SELECT * FROM emergency_contacts WHERE email IS NOT NULL ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT name, phone_number FROM emergency_contacts ORDER BY phone_number ASC, name ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT ec.name, ec.address, ir.relationship FROM emergency_contacts AS ec JOIN individual_contacts AS ir ON ec.contact_id = ir.contact_id WHERE ir.relationship = 'Family';
SELECT da.area_name, ST_X(da.location_point) AS longitude, ST_Y(da.location_point) AS latitude FROM distressed_areas AS da;

SELECT ar.request_id, ar.status, ar.request_timestamp FROM assistance_requests AS ar JOIN assistance_responses AS resp ON ar.request_id = resp.request_id WHERE resp.response_timestamp < NOW() ORDER BY ar.request_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
